channel.title: Mining help [DELTA]
channel.description: Im sure its not that hard, but i kinda suck with coding. im only good at really looking at tuts lol. anyways, when i try to mine on my server, it only mines one ore, and keeps doing the emote. so how do i get it to keep mining ores instead of clicking again every time it mines one ?

item.title: Mining help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

Im sure its not that hard, but i kinda suck with coding. im only good at really looking at tuts lol.
anyways, when i try to mine on my server, it only mines one ore, and keeps doing the emote.
so how do i get it to keep mining ores instead of clicking again every time it mines one ?
